outrun.title: Out Run

sources.description: Sega Out Run Operator's Manual - steering mechanism specifies 270 degree range

outrun.notes: Uses mechanical stops at 135 degrees each direction from center. Sega Super Scaler hardware.

polepos.title: Pole Position

sources.description: Namco/Atari Pole Position uses optical encoder wheel with infinite rotation capability

polepos.notes: Infinite rotation optical encoder (spinner). Maps better to spinner/mouse input than modern wheel.

harddriv.title: Hard Drivin'

sources.description: Atari Hard Drivin' uses potentiometer-based steering with calibration-dependent range. 270 is commonly cited default.

harddriv.notes: Potentiometer-based, calibration-dependent. Actual effective range may vary by cabinet condition.

daytona.title: Daytona USA

sources.description: Standard Sega Model 2 racing cabinet steering specification

daytona.notes: Sega Model 2 hardware. Common Sega 270 degree spec.

ridgerac.title: Ridge Racer

sources.description: Namco System 22 standard steering specification

ridgerac.notes: Namco System 22 hardware. Standard Namco 270 degree wheel.

crusnusa.title: Cruis'n USA

sources.description: Standard Midway racing cabinet steering specification

crusnusa.notes: Midway hardware. Standard 270 degree arcade wheel.

vr.title: Virtua Racing

sources.description: Sega Model 1 cabinet specifications - 270 degree steering wheel

vr.notes: Sega Model 1 hardware. First Sega 3D polygon racing game.

sources.description: Sega Model 2 cabinet specifications - 270 degree steering wheel

fzeroax.title: F-Zero AX

sources.description: Arcade-Projects forum - F-Zero AX wheel estimated at ~150 degrees, less than half a turn

fzeroax.notes: Triforce hardware. Community reports ~150 degrees - significantly less than standard 270. Less than half a turn suits the high-speed F-Zero gameplay.

sources.description: TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field
TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field
TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field

battle_gear_4.title: Battle Gear 4

sources.description: TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field

battle_gear_4.notes: Taito Type X+ hardware. 540 degrees - wider range than typical arcade racers.

battle_gear_4_tuned.title: Battle Gear 4 Tuned

sources.description: TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field

battle_gear_4_tuned.notes: Taito Type X+ hardware. Updated version of Battle Gear 4.

initial_d_4.title: Initial D: Arcade Stage 4

sources.description: TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field

initial_d_4.notes: Sega Lindbergh Yellow hardware. Initial D stages 4-8 use 540 degree rotation.

sources.description: TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field

initial_d_6.title: Initial D: Arcade Stage 6 Double Ace

sources.description: TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field

initial_d_7.title: Initial D: Arcade Stage 7 Double Ace Cross

sources.description: TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field
TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field

initial_d_zero.title: Initial D: Arcade Stage Zero

sources.description: TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field

initial_d_zero.notes: Sega Nu hardware. Series switched from 540 to 270 starting with this entry.

sources.description: TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field
TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field
TeknoParrot Metadata - wheel_rotation field

hummer.title: Hummer

sources.description: Sega Lindbergh standard driving cabinet with 5K potentiometer

hummer.notes: Sega Lindbergh hardware. Standard Sega 270-degree wheel with force feedback.

hummer_extreme.title: Hummer Extreme Edition

sources.description: Same cabinet/hardware as Hummer with updated content

hummer_extreme.notes: Sega Lindbergh hardware. Identical steering assembly to Hummer.

r_tuned.title: R-Tuned: Ultimate Street Racing

sources.description: Uses modified SEGA Race TV cabinet with standard Lindbergh steering

r_tuned.notes: Sega Lindbergh hardware. Modified SEGA Race TV cabinet. TeknoParrot also available as R-TunedElf2.

sega_race_tv.title: SEGA Race TV

sources.description: Standard Sega Lindbergh racing cabinet

sega_race_tv.notes: Sega Lindbergh hardware. R-Tuned uses a modified version of this cabinet. TeknoParrot also available as segartvelf2.

sources.description: Sega Lindbergh standard driving cabinet. Service manual shows standard 8-bit pot steering calibration.

grid_arcade.title: GRID

sources.description: Reuses SEGA Racing Classic cabinet design

grid_arcade.notes: Sega Europa-R hardware. Codemasters game in Sega Racing Classic cabinet.

daytona_championship.title: Daytona Championship USA

sources.description: Standard Sega racing cabinet. Community setup guides reference 270 degrees.

daytona_championship.notes: Sega PC hardware. Spiritual successor to Daytona USA. NSE (Daytona3NSE) is the Network Satellite Edition of the same game.

showdown.title: Showdown

sources.description: Same Sega standard racing cabinet as GRID

showdown.notes: Sega PC hardware. DiRT: Showdown arcade port.

sources.description: Cabinet based on SEGA Racing Classic, uses R-Tuned steering wheel

lets_go_safari.title: Let's Go Safari

sources.description: Sega RingWide kiddie driving game. Uses arcade steering wheel controls.

lets_go_safari.notes: Sega RingWide hardware. Kiddie edutainment driving game.

sega_racing_classic.title: SEGA Racing Classic

sources.description: HD remaster of Daytona USA. Standard Sega racing cabinet.

sega_racing_classic.notes: Sega RingWide hardware. HD remaster of Daytona USA.

sources.description: Uses SEGA Racing Classic cabinet design with cosmetic modifications

harley_davidson.title: Harley-Davidson: King of the Road

sources.description: Motorcycle handlebar controls with 5K potentiometer. Estimated ~90 degrees based on physical handlebar range.

harley_davidson.notes: Sega Lindbergh hardware. Motorcycle handlebars, NOT a steering wheel. Rotation is much less than car games.

fzeroax_monster.title: F-Zero AX Monster Ride

sources.description: Community estimates ~150 degrees. Cabinet variant but same steering input range.

fzeroax_monster.notes: Triforce hardware. Monster Ride cabinet variant. Same ~150 degree range as standard F-Zero AX.

mario_kart_gp.title: Mario Kart Arcade GP

sources.description: Namco-manufactured cabinet on Triforce hardware. Standard Namco 270-degree steering.

mario_kart_gp.notes: Sega Triforce hardware. Namco cabinet design.

mario_kart_gp2.title: Mario Kart Arcade GP 2

sources.description: Same Namco cabinet and steering hardware as MKAGP1

mario_kart_gp2.notes: Sega Triforce hardware. Same cabinet as Mario Kart GP.

sources.description: Namco ES1 standard racing cabinet with force-feedback steering assembly

maximum_heat_3d.title: Maximum Heat 3D

sources.description: Japanese 3D version of Dead Heat. Identical steering assembly.

maximum_heat_3d.notes: Namco ES1 hardware. Stereoscopic 3D version of Dead Heat.

nirin.title: Nirin

sources.description: Motorcycle game using handlebars, not steering wheel. Estimated ~60 degrees.

nirin.notes: Namco ES1 hardware. Motorcycle swivel controller with handlebars. Steering is primarily lean-based.

tank_tank_tank.title: Tank! Tank! Tank!

sources.description: Namco ES1 cabinet. Manual documents stopper arm/shaft confirming mechanical stops.

tank_tank_tank.notes: Namco ES1 hardware. Tank combat game with steering.

mario_kart_gp_dx.title: Mario Kart Arcade GP DX

sources.description: SuzoHapp parts listing: '270 active steering wheel assembly' (part 50-0102-50EX)

mario_kart_gp_dx.notes: Namco ES3A hardware. TeknoParrot variants: MKDX, MKDX118, MKDXUSA, MKDXUSA106.

dead_heat_riders.title: Dead Heat Riders

sources.description: Motorcycle game using force feedback swivel bike seat with handlebars. Estimated ~60 degrees.

dead_heat_riders.notes: Namco hardware. Motorcycle handlebars, NOT a steering wheel.

wmmt3dxp.title: Wangan Midnight Maximum Tune 3DX Plus

sources.description: Same steering hardware as WMMT3 through WMMT6RR series - all confirmed 270 degrees

wmmt3dxp.notes: Namco N2 hardware. Variant of WMMT3.

sources.description: Namco System 246 standard racing cabinet. 270 degrees consistent with Namco standard.

battle_gear_3.title: Battle Gear 3

sources.description: Same series as Battle Gear 4 (confirmed 540). Force feedback servo motor.

battle_gear_3.notes: Namco System 246 hardware. Taito-developed. Same Battle Gear series as BG4 (540 degrees).

battle_gear_3_tuned.title: Battle Gear 3 Tuned

sources.description: Updated version of Battle Gear 3. Same steering hardware.

battle_gear_3_tuned.notes: Namco System 246 hardware. Updated version of Battle Gear 3.

motogp_namco.title: MotoGP

sources.description: Motorcycle racing with handlebars. Estimated ~60 degrees.

motogp_namco.notes: Namco System 246 hardware. Motorcycle handlebars, NOT a steering wheel.

wangan_midnight.title: Wangan Midnight

sources.description: First Wangan Midnight game. Same cabinet lineage as WMMT series (all confirmed 270).

wangan_midnight.notes: Namco System 246 hardware. Predecessor to WMMT series.

sources.description: Upgraded version of Wangan Midnight. Same cabinet and 270-degree steering.
SuzoHapp Active 270 steering assembly. Parts catalog confirms 270-degree active steering for Raw Thrills games.

fnf_drift.title: The Fast and the Furious Drift

sources.description: Same Raw Thrills platform with SuzoHapp Active 270 steering

fnf_superbikes.title: The Fast and the Furious Super Bikes

sources.description: Motorcycle cabinet with swivel bike controller and handlebars. Limited handlebar rotation.

fnf_superbikes.notes: Raw Thrills PC hardware. Motorcycle handlebars with lean-based steering.

fnf_supercars.title: The Fast and the Furious SuperCars

sources.description: SuzoHapp parts catalog confirms shared steering wheel hoop with Raw Thrills car games

super_bikes_2.title: Super Bikes 2

sources.description: Same swivel motorcycle controller platform as FNF Super Bikes

super_bikes_2.notes: Raw Thrills PC hardware. Motorcycle handlebars with lean-based steering.

super_bikes_3.title: Super Bikes 3

sources.description: Same swivel motorcycle controller platform

super_bikes_3.notes: Raw Thrills PC hardware. Motorcycle handlebars with lean-based steering.

batman_raw_thrills.title: Batman

sources.description: Custom Bat Wheel but same Raw Thrills 270-degree platform

batman_raw_thrills.notes: Raw Thrills PC hardware. Custom 'Bat Wheel' design on standard Raw Thrills steering assembly.

cars_pixar.title: Cars

sources.description: SuzoHapp explicitly lists Pixar Cars as using shared Raw Thrills steering wheel hoop

cars_pixar.notes: Raw Thrills PC hardware. Disney Pixar Cars arcade racer.

sources.description: SuzoHapp explicitly lists Dirty Drivin' as using shared Raw Thrills steering wheel hoop

h2overdrive.title: H2Overdrive

sources.description: SuzoHapp explicitly lists H2Overdrive as using shared Raw Thrills steering wheel hoop

h2overdrive.notes: Raw Thrills PC hardware. Boat racing but uses standard steering wheel.

sources.description: Raw Thrills standard platform. Same Dell PC-based hardware as other Raw Thrills car games.

snocross.title: Winter X Games SnoCross

sources.description: Swivel snowmobile handle controller seat with handlebar-style controls

snocross.notes: Raw Thrills PC hardware. Snowmobile handlebars with motion seat. Lean-based steering.

crusnblast.title: Cruis'n Blast

sources.description: SuzoHapp lists Cruis'n Blast as using shared Raw Thrills steering wheel hoop. Active 270 timing belt.

crusnblast.notes: Raw Thrills Linux PC hardware. Latest in Cruis'n series.

motogp_raw_thrills.title: MotoGP

sources.description: Authentic MotoGP replica motorcycle swivel controller with handlebars

motogp_raw_thrills.notes: Raw Thrills Linux PC hardware. Motorcycle handlebars with lean-based steering.

arctic_thunder.title: Arctic Thunder

sources.description: SuzoHapp Active 270 timing belt compatible. Handlebar form factor but uses same 270-degree steering assembly.

arctic_thunder.notes: Midway PC hardware. Snowmobile-style handlebars but with Active 270 steering mechanism.

sources.description: SuzoHapp Active 270 timing belt compatible. Standard steering wheel.

ultimate_arctic_thunder.title: Ultimate Arctic Thunder

sources.description: Updated Arctic Thunder on Midway Graphite hardware. Same handlebar controller.

ultimate_arctic_thunder.notes: Midway Graphite hardware. Updated Arctic Thunder.

sources.description: Gaelco custom hardware. 270 degrees assumed from industry standard.

ring_riders.title: Ring Riders

sources.description: Motorcycle cabinet with handlebars. Manual documents stopper parts limiting rotation.

ring_riders.notes: Gaelco PC hardware. Motorcycle handlebars with motion platform.

tokyo_cop.title: Tokyo Cop

sources.description: Shares motor controller board with Championship Tuning Race. 270 assumed.

tokyo_cop.notes: Gaelco PC hardware. Car chase game.

sources.description: Italian scooter racing with handlebar controls. Limited rotation range.
Direct sequel to Chase H.Q. (confirmed 270 degrees). Taito standard racing cabinet.

d1gp_arcade.title: D1GP Arcade

sources.description: Drift racing game. No official specs found. Taito standard 270-degree steering.

d1gp_arcade.notes: Taito Type X2 hardware. Drift racing.

sources.description: Battle Gear successor/spinoff. Taito standard steering with force feedback.
Uses force feedback steering wheel with SuzoHapp steering mechanism
Standard arcade racing cabinet with steering wheel motor assembly
GTI Club series from Konami. Standard 270-degree arcade wheel.

ballistics.title: Ballistics

sources.description: SuzoHapp 270-degree wheel explicitly listed as compatible with Triotech Ballistics

ballistics.notes: Triotech PC hardware. Futuristic tube racer with motion seat.

sources.description: Same Triotech Mad Wave Motion platform as Ballistics. Same steering assembly.
RC car racing. Uses HAPP UCGI Driving board. 270 assumed from standard components.
Standard arcade racer. 270 assumed from industry standard.
Standard arcade racer. 270 assumed from industry standard.

frenzy_express.title: Frenzy Express

sources.description: Kick scooter controller with handlebars. Very limited handlebar rotation.

frenzy_express.notes: Uniana PC hardware. Kick scooter with handlebars.

sources.description: Chinese arcade manufacturer. Standard steering wheel. 270 assumed.
Chinese arcade manufacturer. Standard steering wheel. 270 assumed.
